def turn(state):

    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_triangle = is_triangle([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)

        check_yz_same_color = same_color([y,z], ctx)

            and check_x_large
            and check_y_light
            and check_z_light
